long_description: Your eyes are of capital importance, protect them with these lightweight, stylish polarized sunglasses! Polarized lenses reduce 99% of visible glare from water, snow, sand and pavement for increased visual acuity and decreased eye strain. Grilamid(TM) lightweight nylon frames offer a consistent fit and flexibility in all temperatures, plus are extremely impact-resistant. Rubber nose pads and temple ends grip during exercise and hot weather for a secure fit. Shatterproof lenses provide 100% UV protection. Sized to fit medium faces.
short_description: Your eyes are of capital importance, protect them with these lightweight, stylish polarized sunglasses!
